titleStmt.title: M. M. Monroe to James F. Robinson
CWG8028

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p: Excuse me for again calling your attention to the vacancy in the "Lower Ponds" magistrates district in this County.
There was no election held there last May -- I recommended M. N. Reaugh and E. W. Rutledge, both loyal men & competent. Reaugh and Scott were the former incumbents, but Scott is seeking his rights.
Do me the favor to send Commissions for these men, direct to County Clerk.

Jefferson Co
Justices
Dist NLower Ponds Dist
App July 20 1863.
